name: SugarOak Holdings
overview:
In 2001, SugarOak began offering real estate investment opportunities to a select group of private investors. In its first investment offering, SugarOak put together a group of investors to purchase an office building in Chantilly, Virginia. In 2002 and 2003, SugarOak formed a group of tenant in common investors to purchase five class A office buildings totaling over 500,000 square feet in Richmond, Virginia. In 2004, SugarOak launched its first investment fund, the SugarOak Acquisition and Revitalization Fund (SOAR). SugarOakâ€™s second fund, the SugarOak Opportunity Fund, opened in May 2009 and remains currently active.

From its beginnings in 1979, SugarOak has grown into a full service real estate company offering construction, management, and investment services across multiple states and multiple property types. SugarOak currently has 44 employees.
